Posts.Content: Aug 22, 2018 06:53PM crsathish wrote: Just diagnosed with breast cancer last week. stage 3 Inflammatory. (one has spread to lymph node). age 35. have 2 kids. vegan.  Pathology report said it 's moderately differentiated invasive DCIS came out on hormones. swelling1: ER : positive >90% PR: negative <1% Her2: negative swelling2: ER : positive >90% PR:positive >5% HER2: negative  swelling3: ER : positive >90% PR:positive >10% HER2: negative  Surgeon is sort of advising me to start with chemo and then check on surgery/radiation.  any advises please? pray for our family
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed- Get Prepared sas-schatzi Amyadipose
